name: PDF Reader
introductoryText:
![PDF Reader](data:image/png;base64,)
## PDF Reader
### Get all PDFs from the folder specified in *Folder path* option, extract text for each PDF page outputting 1 page per record, with an option to create a TXT file for each PDF in the same folder with the extracted text.

options.name: writeTxt
options.title: Extract to TXT files
options.description: If selected Omniscope will create a TXT file for each PDF file with the extracted text.
